message: Let's be fair, I get a bit more
My turn to propose something fair. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at your share!
I'll give you a bit more than before, but I still deserve the bigger share

I'll compromise a bit more, but I won't go below 56
Let's be realistic, Alice. Inflation is eating your share alive! Take this offer before it's too late.
